channel.title: How to add drops
channel.description:
Ok i'm using Richscape V4.1 and i open npcdrops.cfg and this is all that is in there [code]npcdrop = 1 1 6529 3 6529 4 6529 5 6529 6 6529 7 6529 8 6529 9 6529 10 6529 11 6529 12 6529 13 6529 14 6529 15 [/code]
And i add in a drop underneith it and it doesn't work is richscape's drops done differently?

item.title: How to add drops
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

i already tried it like that and it doesn’t add the drop -.-

Read full topic

item.title: How to add drops
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

New line for different Npc Ids

npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE npcdrop = NPCID ITEMID ITEMAMOUNT ITEMPERCENTAGE

Read full topic
